Headline: Normal Green and Brown Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Green and Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier police activity at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Green and Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier police activity at Clark/Lake. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/17th
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, construction near Damen/17th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, construction near Damen/17th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Westbound Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Princeton, 43rd, Wallace, and Pershing due to, street blockage near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Princeton, 43rd, Wallace, and Pershing due to, street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Normal, and Root due to, street blockage near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Normal, and Root due to, street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Revised: Trains bypassing Quincy/Wells
ShortDescription: Revised: Brown, Pink, Green, and Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Quincy/Wells at the request of law enforcement officials.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Brown, Pink, Green, and Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Quincy/Wells at the request of law enforcement officials.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: No Trains Between Pulaski and Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and Ashland/Lake due to injured customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and Ashland/Lake due to injured customer.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem and Pulaski, and,
  • between 63rd Ashland and Ashland/Lake, only.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between Pulaski and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
